gui.veinmining.config.requiredDestroySpe: The minimum destroy speed the used tool needs on the block to vein mine.
gui.veinmining.config.requireCorrectTool: If enabled, vein mining will not activate if the used tool cannot harvest drops from the source block.
gui.veinmining.config.maxBlocksBase.name: Maximum vein mined blocks without enchantment
gui.veinmining.config.maxBlocksBase.desc: The maximum number of blocks to vein mine without the enchantment.
Maximum vein mined blocks per enchantment level
The maximum number of blocks to vein mine per level of the enchantment.
gui.veinmining.config.diagonalMining.des: If enabled, vein mining can mine diagonally.
gui.veinmining.config.limitedByDurabilit: Stop vein mining with no durability
If enabled, vein mining will stop when the tool can no longer be used.
gui.veinmining.config.relocateDrops.name: Relocate vein mined drops
gui.veinmining.config.relocateDrops.desc: If enabled, vein mining will move drops from blocks to the source location.
gui.veinmining.config.preventToolDestruc: Vein mining does not break tools
If enabled, vein mining will never break tools.
gui.veinmining.config.addToolDamage.name: Vein mining damages tools
gui.veinmining.config.addToolDamage.desc: If enabled, vein mining will damage the tool for each block mined.
gui.veinmining.config.toolDamageMultipli: The multiplier to tool damage from blocks that are vein mined.
gui.veinmining.config.addExhaustion.name: Vein mining adds exhaustion
gui.veinmining.config.addExhaustion.desc: If enabled, vein mining will cause player exhaustion for each block mined.
gui.veinmining.config.exhaustionMultipli: The multiplier to player exhaustion from blocks that are vein mined.
gui.veinmining.config.blocks.name: Vein mining blocks
gui.veinmining.config.blocks.description: Determines the vein mineable blocks based on a preset option or a configured list.
gui.veinmining.config.blocksList.name: Vein mining blocks list
gui.veinmining.config.blocksList.descrip: The blocks or block tags for vein mining if blocks is set to "CONFIG_LIST".
gui.veinmining.config.blocksListType.des: Determines if blocksList contains allowed blocks or denied blocks.
gui.veinmining.config.groupsList.name: Vein mining groups
gui.veinmining.config.groupsList.descrip: The groups of blocks or block tags that are vein mined together.
gui.veinmining.config.rarity.name: Rarity
gui.veinmining.config.levels.name: Max levels
gui.veinmining.config.levels.description: The number of levels of the enchantment.
gui.veinmining.config.isTreasure.name: Treasure
gui.veinmining.config.isTreasure.descrip: If enabled, the enchantment is considered a treasure enchantment.
gui.veinmining.config.isVillagerTrade.de: If enabled, the enchantment can be offered by villagers for trade.
gui.veinmining.config.isLootable.name: Generate in loot
gui.veinmining.config.isLootable.descrip: If enabled, the enchantment can generate in loot.
gui.veinmining.config.canApplyAtEnchanti: If enabled, the enchantment can be applied at the enchantment table.
gui.veinmining.config.canApplyOnBooks.de: If enabled, the enchantment can be applied on books.
gui.veinmining.config.minEnchantabilityB: The minimum enchantability required for the first enchantment level.
gui.veinmining.config.minEnchantabilityP: The additional enchantability required for each enchantment level after the first.
gui.veinmining.config.incompatibleEnchan: Enchantments that cannot be applied together with the enchantment.
gui.veinmining.config.itemsList.name: Enchantable items
gui.veinmining.config.itemsList.descript: Items that the enchantment can be applied on.
gui.veinmining.config.activationState.de: If maxBlocksBase is 0, determines how to activate vein mining.
gui.veinmining.config.activationStateWit: If maxBlocksBase is greater than 0, determines how to activate vein mining.
gui.veinmining.config.limitedByWorld.nam: Stop vein mining at world bounds
gui.veinmining.config.limitedByWorld.des: If enabled, vein mining will not attempt to mine past the boundary of a world.
